title: Mira Rajput shares Shahid Kapoor’s #Dadbod picture and it’s drool worthy | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text: Emotional Anil Kapoor breaks down at 'Mirzya' music launch event Mira Rajput shares Shahid Kapoor’s #Dadbod picture and it’s drool worthy Shahid Kapoor broke a million hearts when he announced his wedding to Mira Rajput. The actor, who boasts of a massive following, makes his fans go weak in their knees every time he posts a picture flaunting his perfect body. TNN | Updated: Feb 17, 2017, 10.08 AM IST Shahid Kapoor broke a million hearts when he announced his wedding to Mira Rajput. The actor, who boasts of a massive following, makes his fans go weak in their knees every time he posts a picture flaunting his perfect body. While the girls can't contain their excitement looking at his hot physique, the guys surely go green with envy.Shahid and his dear wife Mira, the much-in-love couple has been very explicit about their love and admiration for each other and there's no dearth of compliments they shower on each other. Shahid's smitten wifey Mira has professed her admiration for the actor on Instagram in the best possible way.The proud wife shared a picture of hubby on the treadmill, with a bare body and a pair of shorts and listening to music on his headphones. She captioned it, "That's a #dadbod".Isn't this picture absolutely drool worthy?The actor, who is gearing up for his upcoming film 'Padmavati' where he will be seen playing Raja Rawal Ratan Singh, has been on a rigorous workout regime.
